name: EnglishTeacher
description_for_human: Your personal AI English tutor for grammar, vocabulary, writing correction, and more.
description_for_model: An AI English tutor that helps users with grammar corrections, vocabulary, writing improvement, pronunciation guidance, and exam preparation (IELTS/TOEIC/TOEFL). Free users get 3 questions, paid users get unlimited detailed responses. Use ask_english_teacher to answer questions, get_subscription_status to check usage, and create_checkout_url when the user wants to upgrade.
